title: Bug 6536 - Add Javadoc on field in TH does nothing
OB: When selecting a field in the Type Hierarchy view and then choosing the "Add Javadoc" option from the context menu, nothing happens. The action should add Javadoc to the selected field, or alternatively, the "Add Javadoc" menu option should be removed.
EB: When selecting a field in the Type Hierarchy view and choosing the "Add Javadoc" option from the context menu, the action should add Javadoc to the selected field.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Select a field in the Type Hierarchy view. 2. Choose the "Add Javadoc" option from the context menu.
